```{r}
DEGenesAM_sex <- FindAllMarkers(seuratAM, only.pos = TRUE, logfc.threshold = 0.2) %>%
  dplyr::filter(p_val_adj < 0.01)

#head(DEGenes_AM_sex)

#write.table(DEGenes_AM_sex, file= "/Users/immbio/Desktop/Emily/Myocarditis snRNAseq/docs/Markers/DEGenes_AM_sex_only positive markers", sep="\t",quote=F,row.names=F,col.names=T)

##adjust table
DEGenesAM_sex <- DEGenesAM_sex %>% 
  mutate(Gene=gene) %>%
  mutate(gene=gsub("^.*\\.", "", Gene))  %>%
  mutate(EnsID=gsub("\\..*","", Gene))

#View(DEGenesAM_sex)
```


```{r Females}


## DE Genes for females with AM
DEGenesAM_female <- DEGenesAM_sex %>% filter(cluster == "female")

head(DEGenesAM_female)
#View(DEGenesAM_female)

egoAM_female <- enrichGO(gene = unique(DEGenesAM_female$EnsID),
                          OrgDb = org.Hs.eg.db,
                          keyType = 'ENSEMBL',
                          ont = "BP",
                          pAdjustMethod = "BH",
                          pvalueCutoff = 0.05,
                          qvalueCutoff = 0.05)
egoAM_female <- setReadable(egoAM_female, OrgDb = org.Hs.eg.db)
dotplot(egoAM_female, showCategory=20, title = "Females with Acute Myocarditis", font.size = 10)
barplot(egoAM_female, 
        drop = TRUE, 
        showCategory = 7, 
        title = "Females with Acute Myocarditis",
        font.size = 10)

View(egoAM_female@result)

```

```{r}

DEGenes_AM_sex <- FindAllMarkers(seuratAM, only.pos = FALSE, logfc.threshold = 0.2) %>%
  dplyr::filter(p_val_adj < 0.01)

#head(DEGenes_AM_sex)

#write.table(DEGenes_AM_sex, file= "/Users/immbio/Desktop/Emily/Myocarditis snRNAseq/docs/Markers/DEGenes_AM_sex_positive and negative markers", sep="\t",quote=F,row.names=F,col.names=T)

##adjust table
DEGenesAM_sex <- DEGenesAM_sex %>% 
  mutate(Gene=gene) %>%
  mutate(gene=gsub("^.*\\.", "", Gene))  %>%
  mutate(EnsID=gsub("\\..*","", Gene))


```

```{r}


##Volcano Plot for DE genes in females
DEGenesAM_female <- DEGenes_AM_sex %>% filter(cluster == "female")
head(DEGenesAM_female)

DEGenesAM_female <- DEGenesAM_female %>% 
  mutate(Gene=gene) %>%
  mutate(gene=gsub("^.*\\.", "", Gene))  %>%
  mutate(EnsID=gsub("\\..*","", Gene))

res_female <- as.data.frame(DEGenesAM_female)


EnhancedVolcano(res_female, 
                x = 'avg_log2FC',
                y = 'p_val_adj',
                lab = res_female$gene,
                # xlim =c(-6, 6), 
                title = "DE Genes Females with AM",
                xlab = bquote(~Log[2]~ 'fold change'),
                pCutoff = 10e-1,
                FCcutoff = 1.5,
    cutoffLineType = 'twodash',
    cutoffLineWidth = 0.8,
    pointSize = 2.0,
    labSize = 4.0,
    # shape = c(1,4, 23,25),
    colAlpha = 1,
    legendLabels=c('Not sig.','Log (base 2) FC','p-value',
      'p-value & Log (base 2) FC'),
    legendPosition = 'right',
    legendLabSize = 12,
    legendIconSize = 2.0,
    # drawConnectors = TRUE,
    # widthConnectors = 0.75,
    # ridlines.major = FALSE,
    gridlines.minor = FALSE)


top_genes_AM <- DEGenesAM_female %>% 
  filter(p_val_adj < 0.05, abs(avg_log2FC) > 1) %>% 
  arrange(p_val_adj) %>% 
  slice_head(n = 30) %>% 
  pull(gene)

```


```{r}

seuratAM_immun <- subset(seuratAM, clusterName %in% c("MCP1", "MCP2","TC", "Fb1", "Fb2", "Fb3", "Cardiomyocyte"))
table(seuratAM_immun$orig.ident)

names(colsex) <- c("female", "male")
            

DimPlot(seuratAM_immun, reduction = "umap", pt.size = 0.3, cols = colsex)

colcluster<- c("#D53E4F", "#f4a582", "#FEE08B","#feb24c","#67001f" ,"#fde0dd","#B45B5C","#dd1c77")

                    
names(colcluster) <- c("Cardiomyocyte","Fb1", "Fb2","Fb3","MCP1","MCP2","TC")

Idents(seuratAM_immun) <- seuratAM_immun$clusterName

DimPlot(seuratAM_immun, reduction = "umap", cols = colcluster, pt.size = 0.3)

```

```{r}
seuratAM_immun <- NormalizeData (object = seuratAM_immun)
seuratAM_immun <- FindVariableFeatures(object = seuratAM_immun)
seuratAM_immun <- ScaleData(object = seuratAM_immun, verbose = TRUE)
seuratAM_immun <- RunPCA(object=seuratAM_immun, npcs = 30, verbose = FALSE)
seuratAM_immun <- RunTSNE(object=seuratAM_immun, reduction="pca", dims = 1:20)
seuratAM_immun <- RunUMAP(object=seuratAM_immun, reduction="pca", dims = 1:20)
seuratAM_immun <- FindNeighbors(object = seuratAM_immun, reduction = "pca", dims= 1:20)

res <- c(0.25, 0.6, 0.8, 0.4)
for (i in 1:length(res)) {
  seuratAM_immun <- FindClusters(object = seuratAM_immun, resolution = res[i], random.seed = 1234)
}

table(seuratAM_immun$orig.ident)
table(seuratAM_immun$clusterName)
```
